meta.name: description
meta.content: Westchester School District 92-5 serves K-8th grade students and is located in Westchester, IL.

nav.marquee: Kindergarten Pre-Registration for the 2020-2021 school year is now open online. Click the "Registration" tab to begin.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 685px; height: 519px;
position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 681px; height: 519px;

div.div: Westchester Public Schools, District 92½, will apply inquiry-based strategies within the curriculum and foster a culturally responsive, caring and safe environment that addresses the instructional needs of all students while developing leadership skills and opportunities.

h1.a: Governor Pritzker Announces Schools to Remain Closed for the Rest of the School Year

section.p: Please click the headline to read Mr. Salemi's April 17th letter to parents, guardians, students and staff.

Westchester Public School District 92½ is providing meals to all children 18 years of age and under. We are providing a breakfast and lunch weekdays via two options. Click the headline for additional information.

td.a: WPS EC/PreK Parent Involvement Day - CANCELLED

address.br:
9981 Canterbury Street, Westchester, IL 60154
